data.description: Processing and analysis of SAGE data.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The module purpose itself (bioinformatic processing and analysis of
    serial analysis of gene expression (SAGE) data) fits perfectly
    within the existing Bio:: root namespace.

    In addition, the existing Bio::MAGE namespace describes packages
    that are used to analyze microarray data (an analagous, but
    distinct, molecular technique to SAGE).

    No modules currently exist that are dedicated to handling data from
    this molecular technique. I have already submitted two initial
    modules: Bio::SAGE::DataProcessing and Bio::SAGE::Comparison.
